file_content.text: Those... blasted mining droids... were tougher than I thought... heh....
I'm not... going to make it... but I hope whoever is watching this... will honor me....
Escaped slaves... stole weapons from the Academy... fled into this tomb. They've reprogrammed... the mining droids.
Without those droids... the slaves won't survive. Tried to... take them down myself... didn't work out.
Destroy enough rogue droids... and the slaves will die. Teach them... not to cross the Sith... heh....
